title: Exodus (JPSA)
creator: Jewish Publication Society of America
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
description: LibriVox recording of Exodus, by the Jewish Publication Society of America. Read by volunteer readers. The second book of the Pentateuch - Exodus. Presented according to weekly parshah. Praised are You, Adonai, Our G-d, ruler of the Universe, who has made us holy with commandments and commanded us to engage in the study of Torah. (Introduction by Linette Geisel & traditional prayer. Parshat descriptions provided by Wikipedia) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: LibriVox; audiobook; Bible; Torah; Scripture; Hebrew Scriptures; Judaism
